cause.description:
Currently, The Hydrocephalus Association (and a lot of loyal members) are working on getting a resolution passed, by President George W. Bush, so that the National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke can start looking for a cure to hydrocephalus! More information on the efforts can be found on the hydrocephalus association's website (http://hydroassoc.org)
1. Spreading the word about Hydrocephalus
2. Finding a cure for Hydrocephalus
3. earning the respect of society (that we truly deserve!)
4. Never having to visit the Emergency Room for head surgery again!
5. Living a happy and healthy life (anywhere in the world, not just in USA and/or Canada!)
cause.mission: help spread the word about hydrocephalus
cause.name: Hydrocephalus research and education
